| About Me

Hello, I am Lars and I am a Developer and Game Designer. I have a huge love for design, development, voice acting and story-telling and it's communities, especially with game development at Video Game Development Association, where I often led and designed for countless projects along with other talented and amazing developers across all disciplines.

News of current projects

The music function of the All-In-One-Bot was relaunched

Crash protection, new design and including PCMVolumeControl were added. Thank you everyone for sticking with us, from the entire team here at All-In-One

Island Game gets active on our Steam page

Head to our Steam page at 5 pm EDT tomorrow (Friday) to grab access to the preview! Hope you can join us! (But if not, stay tuned, we'll be doing more of these!)

New Website goes online

I hope this first newsletters gets you all excited for what's to come! We appreciate your support as this newsletter is the best way to stay up to date with what im doing
